hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Specialized in performance optimization, design systems, and AI tools for development.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A glimpse into who I am as a professional and what motivates me in my career.
about.p1: I am a Frontend Developer with over 5 years of experience building scalable web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I have worked in both startups and established companies, collaborating with multicultural teams in LATAM and the United States.
about.p2: My focus is on code quality, performance, and frontend maintainability. I participated in the creation and evolution of design systems and UI libraries, helping to improve visual consistency and development speed across teams.
about.p3: I use AI tools as support to write better code, document clearly, and optimize processes, always prioritizing simple and sustainable solutions.

experience.title: Professional
experience.subtitle: Experience working on real products, agile teams, and business environments.

finalis.description: Developed and maintained reusable UI components within a fintech platform, contributing to reduced delivery times and improved visual consistency of the product. Paricipated as a co-creator of a Design System adopted by multiple teams, focused on scalability and maintainability.
achievements: Reduced feature delivery time with reusable components
Co-creation and evolution of a company-wide Design System
Identification and resolution of security vulnerabilities in frontend dependencies
Collaborative work with product and backend teams under agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban)

fuzzy.description: Worked on multiple SaaS and fintech projects under staff augmentation modality. Focused on production-ready feature delivery, performance, accessibility, and maintainable code.
achievements: Development and delivery of production-ready features
Collaboration with distributed teams in LATAM and US clients
Implementation of React and TypeScript interfaces with focus on accessibility and best practices
Adaptation to multiple codebases, requirements, and business contexts

rolling.description: Participated in web projects for clients in Argentina and Colombia, working with distributed teams and under agile methodologies (Scrum) in different business contexts.
achievements: Collaboration on projects for clients in Argentina and Colombia, including fintech platforms like Giros y Finanzas (Colombia)
Work in distributed teams, participating in agile ceremonies and task planning
Implementation of frontend interfaces using JavaScript and React
Participation in projects of different scales and domains at a national level

panacea.description: Participated in the initial development of a clinic software, working in a small, collaborative team. My focus was on implementing UI interfaces, transforming UI/UX designs into code using Material Design.
achievements: Implementation of user interfaces from UI/UX designs
Development of frontend views for features like appointments and basic management
Application of responsive design principles and reusable components
Collaboration in a small team during the early stages of the product

contact.infoText: If you're a recruiter, part of a technical team, or evaluating adding a frontend, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm open to discussing professional opportunities.
